Name: FierceWind Decay
About the game: In a strange age, the gear of time seems to continue Prepare to start a short and disillusioned story, and let the gears of time whirl in despair. This is a word game, can you decide the fate of the protagonist? -There are three outcomes -Simple operation -Your choice will have a little influence on the protagonist
